system.sustained:
In response to being the target of a melee attack, after attack has resolved make +0 Willpower Test, if successful attacker suffers 1d10 Rending Damage with Pen 5, Toxic(0), and Crippling(2) Qualities. Armour only reduces damage if it is environmentally sealed. Target can spend a Full Action to remove the Crippling Effect.
This action is gained on casting the Ward of Worms Psychic Power, it is not a Psychic Power.
